response: "{ \"title\": \"Maximum Sum of Three Elements\", \"description\": \"Given an array of integers, find the maximum sum of three elements.\\n\\n#### Function Signature\\n```python\\ndef max_sum_of_three(arr: list[int)) -> int:\\n```\\n\\n#### Input\\n- `arr` (list[int]): A list of integers.\\n\\n#### Output\\n- Returns the maximum sum of three elements from the input array.\\n\", \"code\": \"def max_sum_of_three(arr: list[int]) -> int:\\n    return max(max(a, b), c) for a, b, c in zip(*[iter(arr)]*3)\\n\", \"tests\": [\"assert max_sum_of_three([-1, 2, 3, -4, 5, 6, -7, 8, 9]) == 14\", \"assert max_sum_of_three([1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 9]) == 18\", \"assert max_sum_of_three([-10, 0, 10]) == 20\", \"assert max_sum_of_three([1]) == 1\"] }"
